menu:
1. I think of a number 
2. You think of a number 
3. Exit
1_big_num: What is the biggest number you want to guess? (Please give whole positive number!)
1_tries: How many tries you need to quess? (Please give whole positive number!)
2_big_num: What is the biggest number I can guess? (Please give whole positive number!)
2_tries: How many tries I have to guess? (Please give whole positive number!)
2_minmax: The minimum number can not be bigger than max. Ending game.
1_failed_guess: You could not guess it. I'm sorry. The number was:
error: Something went wrong. Restart the game and give correct numbers!
